snippet: After hours of interrogation that started on Wednesday, the police apprehended Giovanni Vantaggiato, a 68-year-old fuel vendor from Copertino, about 30 miles north of Brindisi.
abstract: Italian police say that they have detained Giovanni Vantaggiato, a 68-year-old fuel vendor from Copertino, a suspect in a school bombing that killed one student and injured five at a school in Brindisi.
lead_paragraph: After hours of interrogation that started on Wednesday, the police apprehended Giovanni Vantaggiato, a 68-year-old fuel vendor from Copertino, about 30 miles north of Brindisi.

headline.main: Italian Police Detain Suspect in Fatal School Bombing
